txt.en: Discover the dwarf-marker in Thorin's Hall
You have discovered Foul-maw's Den
You have discovered Haldirith
You have discovered the Old Burrows
Foul-maw is an old and ugly bear, huge and horrible of temper.
Haldirith, a ruined garden of the Elves, is where the sentinels of Thinglad have made their home.
The Elves of Lórien have an outpost in the little-known woods of Thinglad, a grey place in winter that runs along the edge of the Great River.
You have discovered Ûngund
The den, long abandoned by its former inhabitants, has been lately reclaimed by vicious Wargs.
Discovered Hîs-urdan
Orcs have begun to settle in Thinglad for the first time in many a year. This is surely a sign of evil days to come.
You have found the dwarf-marker in Thorin's Hall
Orcs seem to be everywhere these days, even in the once-peaceful woods of Thinglad, so near to Lórien's edge.
This pillar marks a site where the Dwarves of the Lonely Mountain, under the leadership of first Thráin then Thorin Oakenshield, finally settled during their exile.
Discover the landmarks of interest in Thinglad.
